transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar sir.
Executive: Haan ji. Theek hai sir, namaskar Aniket baat kar raha tha sir main IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye sir boliye.
Executive: Sir, sir aapne concern raise kiya tha na video meeting ke liye sir.
Customer: Haan ji, ye keh raha tha sir subah 6 baje time de sakte hain.
Executive: Sir, hamari jo services hoti hai na, wo hum 9:30 se 6 baje tak ki rehti hai, theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aap 9:30 se 6 ke beech mein aap kabhi bhi free rahenge na sir, to aap ek time bata dijiyega 9:30 se 6 ke beech mein, hum aapko connect kar lenge Monday to Friday, theek hai?
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Aap kabhi bhi free rahenge.
Customer: To sir 9:30 baje hi kar lijiye.
Executive: Kal?
Customer: Kal haan.
Executive: 9:30 se 10.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai sir, ek kaam karte hain, theek hai, agar kal dekhte hain agar hamara off nahi hua, to main aapko connect kar lunga sir 9:30 baje, theek hai? Hamara kal to Saturday hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, actually sir hamara Saturday, Sunday bhi off rehta hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: To agar koi confirmation milta hai agar off rehta nahi to fir main aapko Monday hi 9:30 baje kar lunga, theek hai?
Customer: Haan, Monday 9:30 baje kar lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai, aap aapka jo ek concern hai sir fir main isko close kar deta hu jo aapne ticket raise kiya tha. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai sir, theek hai, theek sir.
Executive: Haan main isko close kar deta hu, aap ek mail aayega sir, theek hai, us pe aap response kar dijiyega, theek hai?
Customer: Theek sir.
Executive: Main aapko fir again basis pe 9:30 baje Monday ko connect kar lunga, main ek reminder laga dunga, theek hai?
Customer: Okay sir, okay.
Executive: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a video meeting at 6:00 AM.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified service hours are 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM.

- Meeting scheduled for Monday at 9:30 AM.

- Ticket will be closed and customer will receive a mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on Monday at 9:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, schedule, monday
